unnormalised: Rental Agreements: Know Your Rights, Yaar!
normalised: Rental Agreements: Know Your Rights, Friend!

unnormalised: Landlords and tenants, listen up! The rental scene in Mumbai, and across Bharat, is heating up. Are you signing that agreement without reading the fine print? Big mistake!
normalised: Landlords and tenants, listen up! The rental scene in Mumbai, and across Bharat, is heating up. Are you signing that agreement without reading the fine print? Big mistake!

unnormalised: New laws are coming into play, especially concerning security deposits. Gone are the days of landlords demanding a year's rent upfront! (Looking at you, Sharma uncle!).
normalised: New laws are coming into play, especially concerning security deposits. Gone are the days of landlords demanding a year's rent upfront! (Looking at you, Sharma uncle!).

unnormalised: Make sure your agreement clearly states everything, from maintenance charges to pet policies (yes, even for your beloved Toto!). Get it registered! Don't be penny-wise, pound-foolish. A registered agreement offers you legal protection.
normalised: Make sure your agreement clearly states everything, from maintenance charges to pet policies (yes, even for your beloved Toto!). Get it registered! Don't be penny-wise, pound-foolish. A registered agreement offers you legal protection.

unnormalised: Thinking of subletting your 1BHK in Bandra? Check the agreement! Many landlords, like Dr. Patel, forbid it.
normalised: Thinking of subletting your one bedroom, hall, kitchen in Bandra? Check the agreement! Many landlords, like Doctor Patel, forbid it.

unnormalised: Also, remember that annual rent increases are usually capped. Negotiate! Know the going rate for similar properties in your area. For example, 600 sq ft apartments in Powai currently average around Rs. 25,000 per month.
normalised: Also, remember that annual rent increases are usually capped. Negotiate! Know the going rate for similar properties in your area. For example, six hundred square feet apartments in Powai currently average around rupee twenty five thousand per month.

unnormalised: Stay informed, stay protected, and happy renting! And always, ALWAYS get that agreement checked by a lawyer, even if your chacha says it's fine.
normalised: Stay informed, stay protected, and happy renting! And always, ALWAYS get that agreement checked by a lawyer, even if your chacha says it's fine.
